name: Parasite Fight
description:
Parasite Fight is a fleshy themed fast paced brawler game. As a four player game, your goal is to eliminate the 3 other players and achieve victory. First to three kills wins the match

_

Controls (Xbox controller only):
- Left Stick: Move
- Right Stick: Aim
- A: Jump
- B: Switch weapon
- RT/RB: Shoot

Features:
- Exploding gory freshness: Players explode with giblets and blood when eliminated.
- Gruelling bloody visuals.
- 4 player madness.
- Destructive terrain.

Some notes:
- Needs to be in 1080p (1920*1080) for the terrain to work correctly. It's tied to screen resolution for us to style it like we wanted it instead of working on resolution dependant positioning.
- WARNING: contains gore.
- Xbox Controller is needed.

Theme: "It's in your nature to destroy yourself".

Made for Global Game Jam 2015
